Name: Supply squad
Rulestext: Other mercenaries you control receive +1/+1 and heal one additional damage per turn.

Name: Rented boat
Rulestext: Crew 1. move 2. This vehicle can carry one unit across sea tiles.

Name: Battle plans
Rulestext: Effect: Choose two: -Deal 1 damage to a unit. -Give a unit +1/1 permanently. -Draw then discard a card. -Move a unit one hex.

Name: Explore
Rulestext: Draw two cards from your land deck, then put one on the board and the other back in the deck, draw a card.
